thread.title: 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway
thread.title_full: 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway

title: 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway
text:
> Entertainment 'Real Housewives' star NeNe Leakes to return to Broadway FILE - In this Sept. 20, 2015 file photo, NeNe Leakes attends the Fox/FX Emmy Awards after party in Los Angeles. Producers of the long-running hit musical “Chicago” said Thursday, Oct. 22, that Leakes will play “Mama” Morton in the show at the Ambassador Theatre from Nov. 23-Dec. 20. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File)
